casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Linwood Earl FORTE. No. 20A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 21, 2004. William N. Farrell, Senior Deputy Attorney General, C. Branson Vickory, III, District Attorney, for State.

*551The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of December 2004 by Defendant to Bypass the N.C. Court of Appeals in Indictment Nos. 01CRS4722-4730:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of December 2004."
